Description: On I-64 at mile marker 278.6 in the City of Norfolk, near Tidewater, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The west left shoulder, left lane, and center lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 52.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 54 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
